name: Synthesis
snippet: A system for easily and seamlessly incorporating virtual objects realistically into pre-existing photographs.

name: arborea
snippet: An immersive virtual reality forest experience made with l-systems, gpu particles, and procedural terrain.

name: Pipes
snippet: A 3D pipe labyrinth generator. Inspired by the famous Windows screensaver. Built with C++ and G3D.

name: Path
snippet: Implemented a path tracer, based on the Monte Carlo rendering algorithm proposed by Kajiya in his 1986 paper The Rendering Equation.

name: Raytracer
snippet: C++ raytracer with Phong and specular lighting, reflections, shadows, and texture mapping.

name: Blue Room Tycoon
snippet: A HTML5 business strategy and time management game. Players must juggle multiple responsibilities and make business decisions as they manage the popular Brown University eatery.

name: Enchanted Clock
snippet: A Harry Potter inspired, arduino-driven grandfather clock with hands that keep track of your housemates around campus.

name: Maps
snippet: A map application for Rhode Island, with zoomable and pannable street view, street search, path finding, and traffic information.

name: Infinity
snippet: Write text documents, add images, import PDFs, make drawings, and take photos, videos, and recordings on this infinite, pen-and-touch friendly workspace.

name: Shell
snippet: UNIX shell implementation in C, created with built-in commands, signal processing, job-control, and I/O redirection.
